item.description:
By popular demand, Rock Climbing is baaaaaack! This is an instructional class which will allow you learn the tricks of the trade.

This class is open to the public, so you need to call REI at 781-740-9430 to reserve as it the class will fill up quickly. Tell them you are a South Shore Fitness Meetup member as we have spots reserved just for us.

Rock Climbing Basics (Class)
Learn the basics of climbing in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere. This limited-enrollment class will include an overview of the dynamic sport of climbing as well as individualized instruction. All gear provided.

This is for men and women.

$20 for members ($20 a year to join REI which is a lifetime membership and you get discounts off all classes and access to their quarterly garage sales as well as REI coupons)
$40 for non-members.

All climbers under the age of 18 must have their parent or legal guardian present. Please let us know if your Guest is under 18 and your relationship to them.

Location:REI Hingham
Contact:REI Hingham Customer Service at 781-740-9430
Cost:$20 for members (it is only $20 for a life-time membership to REI), $40 for non-members
Registration Required?: Yes, class will fill up quickly.
Time: 6:30-8:30

REI Store
98 Derby St Suite 470
Hingham, MA 02043
(781) 740-9430

Meeting Place: Inside store, near climbing wall

Cost: The class is $20 for REI members, $40 for non-REI members.

Event Fees: None

Registration: Must call REI to register

Organizers: Chandra

Min/Max: There is a min of 5 Yes RSVP's by noon on September 14th. There is a max of 8 participants.

Guests: Welcome! One per member.

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by noon on September 14th.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

http://www.rei.com/ma...

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Rock Climbing Basics at REI - for all levels
